actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide for the payment of interest at a rate of 5 percent on excess amounts withheld from individuals' wages.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide that in the case of an individual whose income tax prepayments exceed such individual's liability for the income tax with respect to any taxable year, interest shall be allowed and paid at a rate of five percent upon the excess portion of each such tax prepayment.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide for the payment of interest at a rate of 5 percent on excess amounts withheld from individuals' wages.
